audioText: La virtuosité de ses bras dans cette technique ancestrale et la finesse de chaque cheveu de son pinceau créent une harmonie visuelle d'une intensité saisissante.
question: What creates the striking visual harmony?
options: The virtuosity of his arms in this ancestral technique and the fineness of each hair of his brush
The combination of traditional materials and modern artistic vision
The interplay between light and shadow in the composition
